6000.name: The Edge Of The Forest
6000.description: You are standing at the end of a dusty road, near the eastern edge of the large forest of Haon-Dor.  To the east you see the road heading back to the walled city, Midgaard, and to the west is a narrow trail leading through the forest.

east.description: To the east a dusty road takes you back to the walls of Midgaard, and its large west gate.

west.description: You see a narrow forest trail winding westward in between the trees.

north.description: You see an exit north.

6001.name: A Trail Through The Light Forest
6001.description: You are on a trail leading through the forest.  There seems to be a small path leading north into the shadows.  To the east is the forest edge and to the west the trail leads further into the forest.

north.description: You see evidence of a small path leading through a break in the trees to the north.

east.description: The trail continues eastwards out of the forest.

west.description: You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards in between the trees.

6002.name: A Trail Through The Light Forest
6002.description: You are on a narrow trail winding east and west through the forest.  To the west, the forest gradually becomes more dense.  A small forest path leads off to the south.

east.description: The trail continues eastwards through the young trees.

south.description: The small path leads south through the young trees.

west.description: You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards into the dense forest.

6003.name: A Trail Through The Dense Forest
6003.description: You are on a trail winding east and west through the dense forest.  To the east, the forest gradually seems to become lighter.

east.description: The trail continues eastwards to the younger part of the forest.

west.description: You see the narrow trail winding westwards through the dense forest.

6004.name: A Trail Through The Dense Forest
6004.description: You are on a trail winding east and west through the dense forest.  To the west, the trees are so huge and their crowns so dense that forest remains in total darkness.  A small path leads south through the trees.

east.description: The trail continues eastwards through the dense forest.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

west.description: The narrow trail almost seems to disappear between the enormous trunks.

6005.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6005.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues north and south.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

6006.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6006.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues north and east.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

6007.name: An Intersection In The Dense Forest
6007.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The forest gradually lightens to the east.  Paths lead east, west and south.

east.description: You can barely make out a clearing to the east.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6008.name: The Forest Clearing
6008.description: You are in a clearing in the forest.  Lots of fresh stumps of varying sizes protrude from the ground and heavy logs are stacked neatly in a big pile supported by stakes set into the ground.  Paths lead north, east and west.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

extra_descs.ven though the logs have been chopped to: as they are fresh and still filled with sap.

6009.name: Outside A Small Cabin In The Forest
6009.description: You are outside a small cabin built entirely from heavy logs.  There is a wooden door to the north and small paths lead west and south through the trees.

north.description: The wooden door is quite sturdy but does not appear to be equipped with a lock.

south.description: The small path leads south through the dense forest.

west.description: The small path leads west through the light forest.

6011.name: A Small Path Through The Light Forest
6011.description: You are on a small path leading through the forest.  The trees are tall and slender.  Paths lead north and south.

north.description: The path leads north through the young trees.

south.description: The path leads south through the young trees.

6012.name: An Intersection In The Dense Forest
6012.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest floor in an unreal twilight illumination.  Paths lead north, east and south.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

6013.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6013.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues east and west.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6014.name: An Intersection In The Dense Forest
6014.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest gradually lightens to the north.  Paths lead north, east and west.

north.description: The path leads north to a lighter part of the forest.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6015.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6015.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues south and west.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6016.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6016.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues north, south and east.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

6017.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6017.description: You are at a turn on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest seems to become lighter to the west.  The path continues north and west.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees to a lighter part of the forest.

6018.name: An Intersection In The Light Forest
6018.description: You are on a small path leading through the forest.  A path leads north to a small field and other paths lead east and west into the dense forest.

north.description: The path leads north to a small, grassy field.

east.description: The path leads east to a dense part of the forest.

west.description: The path leads west to a dense part of the forest.

6019.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6019.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest seems to become lighter to the east.  The path continues north and east.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees to a lighter part of the forest.

6020.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6020.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues south and west.

south.description: The small path leads south through the trees.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6021.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6021.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  To the west you see a dark cave entrance, leading into a small hillside.  The path continues north and east.

north.description: The small path leads north through the trees.

east.description: The small path leads east through the trees.

west.description: The cave is very dark.

6022.name: Inside The Cave
6022.description: You are in a natural cave.  Various sorts of debris cover the stone floor, emitting a rather unpleasant smell that makes the air thick and hard to breathe.  The only obvious exit is east.

east.description: The cave opening is to the east.

6023.name: A Grassy Field
6023.description: You are in a grass covered field somewhere in the forest.  The tall grass nearly reaches your waist, and the surrounding oaks and beeches form an almost wall-like thicket on the east side of the field.  To the northeast you can see a small lake.  A small path leads south through the trees, and the field opens up to the north and west.

north.description: Wind blowing in from the north carries with it the smell of a newly killed animal, as well as the noise of many birds, which you can see circling there.

east.description: The ground slopes gently downward to the eastern tree line.

south.description: The small path leads south in between the trees.

6024.name: The Lower Part Of The Grassy Field
6024.description: You are in a lower part of the grassy field, south of a small lake.  The grass here has been trampled by the many animals coming here for water, leaving the ground covered in tracks of different types.  To the west you see a break in the wall of trees surrounding the field, and to the north is a small lake.

north.description: The animal tracks lead off to the north, and around the lake there.

west.description: To the south-west you see a break in the tree line, leading back to the forest path.

6025.name: Beside The Lake In A Grassy Field
6025.description: The grass stops shortly before the lake, replaced by mud covered in tracks from the local animals.  When you come close many animals scatter into the tall grass and some even into the forest.  To the west you see birds circling in the high in the air, and to the north you see a small lake, surrounded by tall reeds.  The field continues to the south, and the forest blocks passage to the east.

north.description: The lake looks inviting, and you can see some sort of water fowl floating around among the reeds.

south.description: To the south an animal trail leads of towards a the other side of the lower field.

west.description: The smell of carrion drifts down to you from higher on the field to the west.

6026.name: The Northern Section Of A Grassy Field
6026.description: As you come close, scavenging animals and birds of all sorts scatter, leaving only the boldest and stupidest encircling the corpse of a large boar. Carrion birds circle overhead, and smaller animals stare out of the tall grass at you.  The grass here has been trampled, and a large area around the corpse is stained by blood.  A trail leads down the sloping field to a lake, and to the south you see the path back to the forest.

east.description: A small lake lies down the sloping field to the east.  Some of the animals that fled from here have gone there, and are watching, waiting for you to leave so they can resume their feasting.

south.description: The field continues to the south, and you can see the path back to the forest there.

6027.name: On The Lake
6027.description: You are in the middle of a small lake, fed from a small stream coming through the forest from the northwest.  The water is not that clear, but you can see fish swimming around below you.  The bank is clear to the south, providing a safe place to get back to the field.

south.description: Some animals have gathered on the bank to watch you, curious about what you are doing.

6028.name: A Small Path In The Dense Forest
6028.description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues to the west and south.

west.description: The small path leads west through the trees.

6029.name: Near A Large Tree In The Dense Forest
6029.description: You are at the end of a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. This rough clearing is dominated by a very large oak tree, probably the largest in this part of the forest.  The path leads back to the north.

up.description: You see the lower branches of the towering oak.

6030.name: In The Lower Branches Of A Large Oak
6030.description: You are in a huge oak, about one third of the way to the top.  The branches above you block out much of the light, but enough filters through for you to see.  Small animals and birds scatter at your approach, rustling the leaves all about you.  You could easily climb back down to the ground, or continue up the tree.  One large branch juts outward to the west, possibly providing a third choice of exit.

west.description: This limb looks large and strong enough for you to walk most of the way along its length to the west.

up.description: More large branches spread out from the tree above you.

down.description: The rough clearing is just a quick climb and jump below you.

6031.name: Out On A Limb In A Large Oak
6031.description: This sturdy branch hangs far out over a path to the west, which you might be able to jump down to.  Several squirrels scamper into hiding as you approach, leaving you alone and swaying slightly with the wind.  To your north you can see a small log cabin through the trees, and to the southeast there seems to be some sort of clearing, with many birds circling above it.

east.description: Back to the east you see the tree trunk.  It is much less precarious there compared to here... perhaps you should go back.

down.description: Below you is a small path, probably used by the forest animals.  You think that you could jump down with a little effort.

6032.name: Midway To The Top Of The Large Oak
6032.description: You are in a huge oak, about midway to the top.  The branches above you block out much of the light, but enough filters through for you to see.  A few birds have remained to watch you from the fringe branches, well out of your reach.  Scratches mar the tree here, and torn bark is scattered near you on the branch.  It would seem some large forest cat lives nearby, so you had better be careful!  You can continue a bit farther up the tree, or descend to limbs that don't sway so much.

up.description: Above you the tree narrows farther, but it still looks like you could climb up there.  A feline shape is pacing about above you, trying to get to a large wounded bird.  Perhaps you should try to see what sort of cat this is before you interrupt its hunt... it might eat you instead of the bird.

6060.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
6060.description: You are on a small shaded path leading through the trees.  The forest gradually lightens to the east.  The path continues to the north, and to the south you see the main trail.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: Through a break in the tree line you see the main trail that heads back towards Midgaard.

6061.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
6061.description: You are at a turn on a small shadowed path leading through the forest.  The forest seems to become lighter to the west.  The path continues north and west.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6062.name: A Shaded Path Through The Dense Forest
6062.description: You are on a small shaded path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest floor in an unreal twililght illumination.  To the north you see a small clearing.  Paths lead east and west.

north.description: Through the underbrush you see a small clearing.

east.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6063.name: A Shaded Path Through The Dense Forest
6063.description: You are on a small shaded path through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues north and east.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

east.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6064.name: A Shadowy Path Through The Dense Forest
6064.description: You are on a small shadowy path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues north and south.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: The path winds its way into darkness.

6065.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
6065.description: You are at a turn on a small shaded path winding through the trees.  The forest gradually becomes more dense to the west.  The path continues west and south from here.

south.description: Through the trees to the south you can almost see the main trail leading back to Midgaard.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6066.name: A Fork On The Shaded Path Through The Forest
6066.description: You are at a fork in the small shaded path winding through the trees.  The forest gradually becomes more dense to the west.  The path branches to the north and south here, and also continues to the east.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

east.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6067.name: At The Fallen Tree
6067.description: You are standing in a small clearing, beside a large fallen tree.  A large amount of the tree has already decomposed, but some pieces remain, scattered about the clearing.  Paths border the clearing to the north and south.

north.description: A shaded path winds its way northeast between the trees.

south.description: A shaded path winds its way east between the trees.

6068.name: An Intersection On The Shaded Path
6068.description: You are on a small shaded path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues north, south, and west.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6069.name: A Shadowy Path Through The Dense Forest
6069.description: You are on a small shadowy path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination. The path continues south and east.

east.description: The path winds its way between the old trees.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6070.name: Off Of The Path In The Shaded Forest
6070.description: You are wandering amongst the trees in the light forest, without the aid of a path or trail.  More sunlight trickles through the treetops here, making your travel a bit easier.  Small animals scurry away as you approach.  You are no longer on a path, so you may go whichever way you please.

north.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

east.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

south.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

west.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

6071.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
6071.description: You are on a small shaded path leading in between the trees.  The forest gradually lightens to the east.  Paths lead west and south, and you think you see a small path leading eastward.

east.description: It looks like a small path begins between two trees to the east, but you aren't quite certain.

south.description: The path winds its way through the trees to an split in the path.

west.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6072.name: A Shaded Path Though The Forest
6072.description: You are on a small shaded path leading between the trees.  The forest gradually becomes more dense to the west.  Paths lead north and east, and you see a small clearing to the south.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

east.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

south.description: A lightly traveled path heads southward to a small clearing.

6073.name: A Shadowy Path Through The Dense Forest
6073.description: You are on a small shadowy path leading through the dense forest.  To the north the terrain becomes quite hilly and rough.  The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path continues north and south.

north.description: The path winds its way into the hills and denser forest.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6074.name: A Small Trail Through The Forest
6074.description: You have just left the shaded path, and you are now standing at the head of a very short trail.  It looks like someone begin clearing away the underbrush here, but didn't get finished.  You may leave in any direction, but the path is to the west.

north.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

east.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

south.description: The trees seem to part, exposing a trail into the shade.

west.description: Through the underbrush you see a small path winding its way northward.

6075.name: A Shaded Path Through The Forest
6075.description: You are on a small shaded path leading between the trees.  The forest gradually becomes more dense to the west, and to the northwest the terrain is quite hilly.  The path continues north and south.  To the east you see a trail winding through the younger section of the forest.

north.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

east.description: You think you see the beginnings of a small trail through the younger part of the forest.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6076.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
6076.description: You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight illumination.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

west.description: All you see are trees and a shadowy path.

6077.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
6077.description: You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight illumination.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

west.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

6078.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
6078.description: You are at the end of a small shaded path leading between the trees.  The forest is quite thick here, and the ground is very rough and hilly, halting your progress.  The path lies to the south.

south.description: The path winds its way between the trees.

6079.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
6079.description: You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight illumination.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and a shadowy path.

west.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

6080.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
6080.description: You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight illumination.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

west.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

6081.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
6081.description: You are standing among tightly packed trees between several hills.  You lost track of the path long ago, and now must rely on your instincts to guide you.  The ground is very rough and rocky here, and only the most hardy plants survive.  The crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight illumination.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

west.description: All you see are trees and a shadowy path.

6082.name: In The Dense Forest Between The Hills
6082.description: You are standing among tightly packed trees on a medium sized hill. The dense forest spreads out all around you, and the crowns of the old trees leave the hills in an unreal twilight illumination.

north.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

east.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

south.description: All you see are trees and hillsides.

6090.name: A Road Through The Plains
6090.description: You are on a dust covered east-west road through the western plains.  An occasional hunter or adventurer can be seen, heading to or from the forest. To the east is the walled city, Midgaard, and to the west the road ends at the head of a narrow trail into a large forest.

east.description: Far to the east you see the large walls guarding Midgaard.

west.description: To the west the dusty trail ends, and becomes a narrow trail into the cool shadows of the forest.

6091.name: A Road Through The Plains
6091.description: You are on a dust covered east-west road through the western plains.  An occasional hunter or adventurer can be seen, heading to or from the forest. To the east is the walled city, Midgaard, and to the west the road continues  towards a large forest.

east.description: Far to the east you see the walls and western gate of Midgaard.

west.description: You see the large forest, Haon-Dor, stretching out far to the west, and to the northwest you the forest gives way to hills.

6092.name: A Road Through The Plains
6092.description: You are on a dust covered east-west road crossing the grassy plains between Midgaard the forest of Haon-Dor.  An occasional hunter or adventurer can be  seen, heading to or from the forest.  To the east is the walled city, Midgaard,  and to the west the road continues towards a large forest.

east.description: To the east you see the walls and West Gate of Midgaard.

west.description: To the west the road continues towards the forest.

6000.name: john
6000.long_desc: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.
6000.description:
He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy,
chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is
one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.

6001.name: rabbit
6001.long_desc: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.
6001.description: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.

6002.name: bear
6002.long_desc: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
6002.description:
The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp
teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little dolls from toy shops at all.

6003.name: rabbit
6003.long_desc: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
6003.description:
This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked
by the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and
innocent rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.

6004.name: deer
6004.long_desc: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
6004.description:
She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes
looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.

6005.name: fox
6005.long_desc: A brown fox is stalking rabbits through the underbrush here.
6005.description: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick bushy tail.

6006.name: bird
6006.long_desc: A large bird with a broken wing has been cornered here.
6006.description: The bird isn't going to live much longer, by the looks of it.

6007.name: bobcat
6007.long_desc: A medium sized bobcat is stalking a bird here.
6007.description:
The bobcat has sharp claws and teeth, and will probably eat you instead of
the bird if you give it the chance.

6008.name: sparrow
6008.long_desc: A sparrow is flapping around by the ground.
6008.description: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

6009.name: robin
6009.long_desc: A robin is hopping around looking for bugs to eat.
6009.description: The robin looks quite intent on finding a bug or worm to eat.

6010.name: squirrel
6010.long_desc: A squirrel is here seeking refuge in its nest.
6010.description:
It peers out of its nest at you anxiously, seeming to plead silently with
you to leave it alone.

6011.name: badger
6011.long_desc: A furry brown badger is curled up under a log here.
6011.description:
The badger is slowly awakening and peering up at you from its burrow. You
know that it won't be moving this slow for long.  Its sharp claws and teeth
catch your attention when you consider killing it.

6012.name: grey
6012.long_desc: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.
6012.description:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.

6013.name: chipmunk
6013.long_desc: A small brown-red chipmunk dashes from tree to tree here.
6013.description:
The absolute zenith of hyperactivity, this small rodent seems to never tire
of running up, down, and around the trees in this area.  If you could ever
catch it, you imagine it would make an easy meal.

6014.name: crow
6014.long_desc: A large black bird flits about here, picking at bits of carrion.
6014.description: The bird eyes you warily, but continues with its meal.

6015.name: grotesque
6015.long_desc: A grotesque vulture covered in blood and gore is here feeding madly.
6015.description:
It sickens you to even look at this foul bird.  Bits of dried gore stick to
its beak, and unidentifiable organs hang from its talons and feathers.  
It sees you and attacks, protecting its horrible feast!

6016.name: buck
6016.long_desc: A young 5-point buck is drinking from the lake here.
6016.description:
This young male deer is drinking from the edge of the lake and watching you
warily.  His antlers are not full size yet, and will no doubt be quite 
impressive in a few years.

6017.name: fish
6017.long_desc: A fish is swimming about here.
6017.description: The fish looks about the right size for a meal.

6018.name: duckling
6018.long_desc: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
6018.description: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

6000.name: axe
6000.room_desc: A heavy lumber axe lies here.

6002.name: boots
6002.short_desc: a pair of worn leather boots
6002.room_desc: A pair of worn leather boots lies here.

6003.name: fireplace
6003.room_desc: A fireplace made from stone is set against the east wall.

6004.name: lantern
6004.room_desc: A hooded brass lantern has been left here.

6005.name: chest
6005.room_desc: A wooden chest stands in the corner.

6006.name: key
6006.room_desc: A small brass key lies here.

6007.name: coins
6007.room_desc: Some gold coins lie piled up in a heap on the floor.

6010.name: blackberries
6010.room_desc: Some blackberries grow on a bush nearby.

6012.name: sign
6012.room_desc: A large sign mounted on a pole is standing by the roadside.

6013.name: barrel
6013.room_desc: A water barrel has been left here.

6014.name: water
6014.room_desc: A small brook trickles through the forest beside the path.

6018.name: slab
6018.room_desc: A large piece of freshly cut boar meat is on the ground here.

6019.name: tusks
6019.room_desc: A pair of large boar tusks have been dropped here.

6022.name: egg
6022.room_desc: A small bluish egg has been left here.

6023.name: meat
6023.room_desc: A large piece of rabbit meat.
